metadata.title: About - Travel Like a Local Japan
metadata.description: Learn about the guide behind Travel Like a Local Japan, offering authentic travel experiences, consulting, booking, and personalized tours across Japan.

hero.title: Travel Like a Local Japan: Your Authentic Journey Begins
hero.intro: Hi, I'm Ryoto, founder of Travel Like a Local Japan. As a National Government Licensed Guide Interpreter, I'm passionate about sharing the real Japan. This site offers insights for your travels, and I provide personalized trip consulting, booking assistance, and guided tours to help you experience Japan authentically.

story.title: More Than Just a Tour Guide: The Story Behind It All
story.p1: My journey started with a simple idea: travel is richer when you connect with locals. Inspired by experiences like CouchSurfing and guiding friends visiting Japan, I saw how much more meaningful travel becomes when you step off the beaten path and experience a place through local eyes.
story.p2: That's the heart of "Travel Like a Local Japan." It's not just about seeing sights; it's about understanding the culture, discovering hidden gems, and creating genuine memories. As a licensed guide who has explored extensively throughout Japan, I use my firsthand knowledge to craft these unique experiences for you.

services.title: What "Traveling Like a Local" Means for You

consulting.title: Trip Consulting
consulting.desc: Let's craft an itinerary beyond the guidebooks, tailored to your interests but open to the kind of spontaneous local encounters and hidden gems that make a trip truly memorable.

booking.title: Booking Assistance
booking.desc: From navigating complex transport to finding unique stays, I'll handle the logistics smoothly, freeing you up to simply enjoy the journey and embrace unexpected opportunities.

tours.title: Personalized Guided Tours
tours.desc: Go beyond sightseeing. I'll guide you to authentic experiences, facilitate connections with locals, and help you discover the true heart of Japan, just like my own inspiring encounters.

services.websiteResource: This website also serves as your resource for planning an authentic Japanese adventure, filled with tips and articles based on real experiences.
